text: Rugby sevens at the 2003 Pacific Games was played as a tournament for 11 men's teams from 3–5 July 2003 at Suva in Fiji. The Fijian team won the final, defeating Cook Islands by 43–10 to claim the gold medal. ==Medal summary== {| |- |Men's rugby 7s | | | |} ==Participants== There were 11 teams for the 2003 tournament: * * * * * * * * * * * ==Format== The eleven teams were drawn into three pools and the first stage was played as a round robin within each group. The top two teams from the each pool and the best two third-placed teams advanced to the knockout stage.
